introduction: Hello, my name is Pepper. I will be your co-chair this afternoon.
I will make sure that the speakers keep the time of their presentations.
I am not an experiment, Serena.
You are right I am not yet fully autonomous. But that's the robot life in these days!
You are right. It is true that with my onboard sensors I cannot yet understand what happens in this room. I do not even see you well. As a robot I am a disaster.
My human pilot and I will do our best to serve this workshop. After all, we are in a theatre and this is an act.
Serena Ivaldi will now introduce the workshop.
The first speaker is Francesco Nori, from Google Deep Mind.
The second speaker is Kazuya Otani, from Inria.
We now have the short presentations from the authors presenting a poster. All the poster presenters should come here.
The first poster is from Claudio Gaz, from the University of Rome.
The second poster is from Pavan Kanajar, from IIT.
The third poster is from Valerio Modugno, from the University of Rome.
The next poster is from Rudolf Lioutikov, from TU Darmstadt.
The next poster is from Erich Mielke, from BYU.
Keep the extra questions for the poster session during the coffee break! See you in half an hour!
Keep the questions for the discussions in the afternoon! Now it is time for lunch. See you at half past one!
